name: The Life Of Adam
description:
A narrative game, based upon an Autistic student’s daily life.Telling story through live action sequences (cutscenes) and depict the autism experience through the gameplay in a careful manner showing their struggles and special abilities by introducing two contrasting game modes. The player can make a key decision during the live action sequence which will decide which game mode they will proceed to. The game-play starts when the main character in the live action (Adam) goes to sleep and dreams.
